data.name: Hektor - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original Soundtrack to Hektor. Composed by Shaun Chasin.

Track listing:
1. Is This Real?
2. History
3. Snip Snip
4. The Offices
5. Stop The Water
6. The Cells
7. Run And Hide
8. Don't Make A Sound
9. To The 4th Floor
10. The Infirmary
11. Start The Fire
12. Time Out
13. Finale and Credits

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 3870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 2.4GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9800m/ ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro / Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
